thread.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
thread.title_full: Call of Duty: Black Ops III

title: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
28 Sep 2015 02:51 AM EST 
Games in the Call of Duty series have been multiplayer-focused for a while now. However, they’ve always shipped with a single-player campaign mode for those who still prefer to play alone. With Call of Duty: Black Ops III that changes, at least for some gamers. Black Ops III will be released on November 6.The decision has nothing to do with a lack of time or effort, it’s because the older hardware platforms simply can’t cope with the 1-4 player co-op single-player campaign.
